content: How can I use MATLAB code to not only rearrange the given sentence "the student was extremely tired the exam" to form a grammatically correct sentence but also count the number of times the word "tired" appears in the original sentence and replace it with "exhausted" in the rearranged sentence? The desired output should be "The student was extremely exhausted after the exam." Please provide a code that takes the input sentence as a string and returns the rearranged sentence with the word count and replacement as a string.
